aboutdescription: This app was created to provide an example reference implementation to bootstrap and accelerate react project and to explore using various client side libraries to compose a rich user experience.
authenticatedcontentdescription: Here is content displayed only if user is signed in
contactdescription: Fill out the form to submit contact info - this is example use of form and styling it
footer_tagline: Next-generation UI builder powered by advanced AI models.
formsexampledescription: Example of use of forms and validation via react-hook-form
getstartedmessage: To get started use the menu to navigate and change languages
hero_description: A production-ready React starter with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, TypeScript, and modern best practices. Build beautiful web applications faster with this comprehensive accelerator.
landing_cta_description: Skip the setup and dive straight into building features. Get a production-ready React app with authentication, routing, beautiful UI components, and modern best practices—all configured and ready to go.
landing_cta_footer_text: No credit card required • Open source • MIT License
landing_cta_heading: Start Building Your Next Project Today
landing_feature_beautiful_ui_desc: Pre-configured with shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS for a modern, accessible, and customizable design system out of the box.
landing_feature_component_library_desc: Comprehensive set of reusable components including forms, modals, navigation, and more - all fully typed and documented.
landing_feature_developer_experience_des: Hot module replacement, fast builds with Vite, ESLint configuration, and modern development tools for maximum productivity.
landing_feature_modern_tech_desc: Built with React 19, TypeScript, Vite, and the latest web technologies for optimal performance and developer experience.
landing_feature_production_ready_desc: Includes authentication, routing, state management, and best practices. Start building features immediately, not infrastructure.
landing_feature_typescript_desc: Full TypeScript support with strict typing, ensuring code quality and catching errors before they reach production.
landing_features_description: Powered by Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, Lucide Icons, Framer Motion, and more. Everything you need to build modern, beautiful web applications—pre-configured and ready to go.
lucide_vite_description: Beautiful, consistent icons from Lucide.dev powered by Vite's lightning-fast build tooling for modern web development.
materialuidescription: Visually appealing React components that implement Google's Material Design along with layout and theming support.
pricing_description: Get credits for enhanced search capabilities
notificationsdescription: Below are examples of 'toast' style notifications
reactjsdescription: React makes it painless to create interactive UIs using encapsulated components that manage their own state.
serviceexampledescription: Example of use of services and HttpClient
settingsdescription: Choose a primary color for the application theme
signin_error_description: Please check your credentials and try again.
signup_complete_description: Check your email for the account verification email.
signup_complete_message: Your email needs to be verified before you can sign in. Check your email inbox (and spam folder) for the account verification email which will contain a link to click to verify your account.
signup_header: Create your account and start creating!
signup_success_description: Your account has been created. Check your email for the account verification email.
technologydescription: This application was built using the following technologies:
